title: PROJECT 1
subtitle: Full website creation
summary: On demand of Mario Rossi, I have created one of the most captivating sites in history from scratch!
description: I'm still thankful to Mario Rossi for having created with me one of the most captivating sites in history. The project lasted 3 months: hard work, a lot of UX-surveys, and a large amount of stylistic attempts brought us to the perfect web-site. Rate it by yourself!

title: PROJECT 2
subtitle: Updating/Upgrading SEO
summary: Beatrice now has more customers thanks to her new SEO strategy.
description: Finally Beatrice has more customers thanks to her BRAND NEW POWERED SEO! We optimized keywords, structure, and technical SEO, resulting in a significant traffic increase.

title: PROJECT 3
subtitle: UX/UI design
summary: Collaboration with Lily Cameron: best intuitive, suitable and prettiest UX/UI project of 2023!
header: From a perfect UX to an amazing UI!
description: Description of the collaboration with Lily Cameron: best intuitive, suitable and prettiest UX/UI project of 2023!
